properties.name: max
properties.description: Number of stars for rating component.

properties.name: readonly
properties.description: If true will not react on any user events.

properties.name: disabled
properties.description: If true will not react on any user events and show disable icon over

properties.name: fullIcon
properties.description: Icon for selected rating .this attribute use only user have custom rating icons.example ☑

properties.name: emptyIcon
properties.description: Icon for non-selected rating .this attribute use only user have custom rating icons.example ☐
